# Team Settings & Inventory

> **来源**: https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/team-settings-inventory
> **爬取时间**: 2025-12-27T02:11:58.243654

---

An important device for most team-based games, this gives you additional team- and inventory-related configurations beyond what the [Island Settings](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite-creative/fortnite-creative-glossary#islandsettings) can provide. You can also use this to customize individual devices to create variations in team setup.

For more info, see [Team Settings & Inventory Devices](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite-creative/using-team-settings-and-inventory-devices-in-fortnite-creative).
